tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had to get braces and I had opted to take Invisalign. I heard that Dr. Smitha Shetty was a good orthodontist and I went to her clinic. She is a warm and friendly person. She explained the process very clearly and everything went smoothly. I found the whole process easy going, both the check-up visits and the treatment overall. It helped me fix my crooked teeth with minimal damage and also did the same in a relatively fast time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is so calm and gentle in speak, I am still under treatment and visited around 5-6 times, behaviour of all the staffs are same (good) from day 1. First come first serve. My treatment is going good under her guidance. As i observed with other patients during my treatment visiting, not found any negative or unsatisfied behaviours. Even I too consulted after  reviewing the ratings and comments, found its true and Dr. Smitha is a well experienced and a good hand in giving treatments, give you the exact picture how it's going to work and what can she try, would like to give complete comments after completing the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Great! Here's a draft for your review:

---

I recently got Invisalign treatment and I couldn't be happier with the results. From the initial consultation , she  provided exceptional care , thoroughly explained the treatment process and answered all my questions, made me feel comfortable and informed every step of the treatment . I recommend Dr. Smitha Shetty for anyone considering Invisalign or any dental care needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was at the clinic around 7:30 PM and had to wait less than 10 mins. Dr. Smitha patiently listened to my dental issues, thoroughly examined(recommended x-ray) and provided detailed diagnosis which helped me understand my dental issues. Next day, I shared the x-ray over the WhatsApp and she replied very quickly provided her further diagnosis over the WhatsApp which saved(time/money) me another trip of going to the clinic. She provided precise diagnosis without scaring or recommending unwanted procedures. She is highly professional and remarkably skillful. I would definitely visit  her for future dental issues and highly recommend her
reply_text: Thank you sir for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had visited multiple dental clinics for Invisalign and other substitute treatments before visiting Dr.Smitha. I decided to proceed with her mainly because of the honesty and the clarity of the program that she provided during the consultation.

I am with Invisalign treatment for quite some time now and see prominent changes. The experience has been good in terms of support received and positive results. I have not matter doctor who is so Proactive in follow-ups and tracking the progress so closely.

It also worth mentioning about the clinic which is very hygenic place with courteous staff. 

Overall good experience and extremely happy. Dr.Smitha is now a  family dentist for us..üôÇ
reply_text: Thank you Deepti for your valuable feedbacküòä

review: Wonderful doctor!! Most important is that the doctor has lot patience to handle the patient . She is very friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Smitha provided exceptional dental care, delivering outstanding results that are visibly evident. Her services offer great value for the money spent. She displayed remarkable patience and skillfully addressed all my concerns. Her clear and informative explanations ensured I fully understood the solutions to my dental issues. Overall, an excellent experience with Dr. Smitha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Smitha is highly professional, she never compromised on the treatment , she is one of the  well trained and highly skilled dentist in Bangalore.

I have undergone with Crown and braces treatment.. Found 100% value for my money.

Clinic is very neat and clean they have well trained supporting staff and all new equipment's for the treatment.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I visited Dr Smitha for invisible/Clear braces, she explained the options available without pushing me towards any product while giving pros/cons for each product. I eventually chose Invisalign clear braces. I'm fully satisfied with the entire experience. It has been 10 weeks since I've started wearing the braces and I can feel a difference already. I highly recommend Dr Smitha.
reply_text: Thank you sir for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had by far the best dental treatment experience ever. It was highly recommended by one of my friend. Though the clinic was far from my home (25kms) it was worth every km I travelled. Honest and transparent communication from doctor throughout the procedure.No unnecessary expensive treatment suggestions.Doctor performed only what was necessary and flexible with appointment timing.Smile and glow is highly recommended in today's world where trust and honesty is hard to find.
